Subreddit Analysis

Reddit is one of my favorite websites to waste time on. If you aren’t familiar, Reddit is a bulletin board style website where you can share interesting links, pictures, posts, etc. with other people. To help organize what you share, you are asked to decide which subreddit you would like to post the information to. A subreddit is simply a community within the website where you can only post information that pertains to the topic of the subreddit. There are thousands of subreddits ranging from politics to tv show fanbases.

If you browse through reddit enough, you may start to notice that you can often read the title of a post and guess which subreddit it came from. This is due to the fact that each subreddit typically has its own unique set of verbage. Political subreddits will typically use words like ... while subreddits that focus on tv shows will often use the names of the characters in the show frequently. This made me wonder, can I write a program that is able to differentiate between subreddits strictly based off of the verbage that is used in post titles?

The Python code for this project can be found here: Reddit Latent Semantic Analysis

Gathering and Processing Submission Titles From Reddit

To gather submission titles from Reddit, I used a Python package called PRAW (Python Reddit API Wrapper). PRAW allows for simple access to Reddit's API. It's easy to use and allows you to gather up to 1000 submission titles (per subreddit) at once.

For this project, I decided to keep it simple and only gather 1000 submission titles from the Westworld, Doctor Who, and Game of Thrones subreddits.

While gathering submission titles, I filtered out all special characters along with stop words to make it easier to process the data when we do LSA. I combined both of the nltk and sklearn stopwords lists. Here is a sample of the program filtering the submission titles: 

Gathering top 3 submission titles from westworld...

Submission title: My Secret Santa sent me a package, but it doesn't look like anything to me.

Filtered submission: secret santa sent package look like

Submission title: Everything you feel is true. Ed Harris has been nominated for “Outstanding Lead Actor in 
                  a Drama Series” at this year’s Emmys.

Filtered submission: feel true ed harris nominated outstanding lead actor drama series year emmys

Submission title: Reading the Emmy nominations and not seeing anything for the true star of season 2.

Filtered submission: reading emmy nominations seeing true star season

Successfully parsed 3 submissions out of 3 --- 100.00%

Results: 

Gathering top 1000 submission titles from westworld...
Successfully parsed 974 submissions out of 1000 --- 97.40%
            
Gathering top 1000 submission titles from doctorwho...
Successfully parsed 998 submissions out of 1000 --- 99.80%
            
Gathering top 1000 submission titles from gameofthrones...
Successfully parsed 987 submissions out of 1000 --- 98.70%
            
Successfully parsed a total of 2959 submission titles over 3 subreddits --- 98.63%
            
Bundling up submissions...
            
Successfully bundled: 2947 submissions
Successfully tagged: 2947 submissions
